To create a game group click the + button on the side menu and the New Group option

You must have a glass of bozo with 5 dice
To create a new group click the +
Here you add the group name and players
On this screen you will score the values you get playing with the glass of bozó
First you will need, a cup of Bozo and 5 dice.

Then the participants will have to decide who will start. Á many ways, the more we explanation. The player who is starting will put the 5 dice inside the cup and shake until blended and then throws on the table, there removes the glass being careful not to untap the data. If given after the cup is untapped, are one on top of another error that move is not counted and the player You can play again. Recalling that the time to mix the data in the cup, the mouth of it must be not to close drop any given out. then made the first move, the player will still have two more chances to throw the dice. So just to confirm after the first play he chose what kind of play will want.
Types of moves the arrow to the right

The types of possible moves within the Bozo are these: AZ, Duque, Terno, Quadra, Quina, Sena, Full, Seguida, Quadrada, General, as illustrated below. The mark you make will depend on the stones that come after the three shots. But you can mark what you want, another good player follows a strategy.

When playing the data, it will give you 5 points. Using the basic strategy, you will choose the values that are repeated more or worth amis points. It's just you remember that to mark should add the values obtained by particular game you have chosen. with Full exceptions, Seguida, Quadrada and General, why these plays already have a set score.

Time to score points you can not add all the points but choose a type of game, and then you can add. For example, if I have two duques and 3 quinas, the first move of the three possible. But assuming I want the quina as worth more points and is the one most repeated, then I add all totaling 15 points of quina. and on the table in our app you will score in quina. I make him a note, two duques and 3 quinas it is also a full play and is still mouth. So I can score 15 points in the table, in full play. But if the move is the General bôca.Ai the value becomes 100 points and the move is completed immediately because the player who made the general's mouth, wins the match with the sovereign point, regardless of whether another player is winning.

Let's learn how to play Bozo. First of all you will need. a cup of Bozo and Five data. After Participants will have to decide who will start. Á several ways to desidir it, the more we explanation. The player who is starting will put the five data in the cup and shake until blended. And then throws on the table. Ai remove the glass carefully. not to untap the data. If given after the glass is untapped. Are one on top of another. This move error is not counted, and the player You can play again. Remembering! It's time to mix the data in the cup, the mouth of it must be not to close drop any data out of the cup. then made the first move. The player will still have two more chances to throw the dice. Just to confirm. After the first move he will choose what kind of play will want to do.
If you want more details of the moves push the screen to the left or click the right arrow to more informções.
The types of possible moves within the Bozó. Áz. Duque. Terno. Quadra. Quina. Sena. Fúll. Seguida. Quadrada. General. As in the illustration below. The mark you make. will depend the stones that come, fter the three shots. But you can mark what you want. For a good player follows a strategy. Since we're talking strategy, using the basic strategy. You will choose the values that are repeated more or worth more points. Remember that to mark should add the values obtained by the game you have chosen. More has some exceptions like the move. Full. Seguida. Quadrada. General. Why these moves have already set scores.
Time to score points you can not add all the points but choose a type of game and then you can add. I will give an example here for you. If I have two duques.E three quinas. In this example I will talk about two kinds of possible moves. Well first let's assume that I want the quina. Why it is worth more and is also the more repeats. Then I'll add these 3 quinas, totaling fifteen points. Then I mark on the table in our application. Fifteen points in quina. But the other kind of play. As you can see. When you have two dice which is Duke's value. And 3 dice from the quina value. It is formed full also move.
That perhaps it was made the first shot. And when such a move is carried out in one fell swoop. It uses the term play of mouth. then the play gets 5 points more and ful. Becomes worth 15 points. Then I can score table. in Joagada full.
An important example. It is the general's mouth. When the player makes a move the mouth of General ie if coming five stones of qualqer value all the same. General forty points. Becomes one hundred points. Oh no way. The player who made that kind of move. Win instantly with sovereign point. And the game is finished regardless of whether another player was already winning.
Basically this is how you play a Bozo.
Or Áz or move also called number 1. The data Áz is the sum of its values which can vary from 1 to 5 points.
The die. Áz. Or play them. It can also be called a number. The Dice Áz has the sum of its values can range from A to five points.
Or play Duque or also called number 2. The data Duque is the sum of its values which can vary from 2 to 10 points.
Given Duque. Or play Duke. It may also be called Two number. The data Duque is the sum of its values which can range from two to ten points.
Terno or move or also called the number 3. The terno has given the sum of their values may vary from 3 to 15 points.
The terno dice. Or play terno. It can also be called Number Three. The terno has given the sum of its values that can vary from three to fifteen points.
Or move quadra or also called the number 4. The quadra has given the sum of their values can range from 4 to 20 points.
The quadra data. Or move quadra. It can also be called Four number. The quadra has given the sum of its values which may vary from four to twenty points.
Quina or move or also called the number 5. The data quina is the sum of its values which may vary from 5 to 25 points.
The Quina dice. Or move quina. It can also be called Five number. The quina has given the sum of its values can range from five to twenty-five points.
Sena or move or also called the number 6. The data sena is the sum of its values which can vary from 6 to 30 points.
Given the Sena. Seine or move. It can also be called Six number. The data sena is the sum of its values which may vary from six to thirty points.

In order to form the full play, you need the five dice. Two data must be of a value, since the other three data valor.Por another example, the first two data values 6-6 are the other three data would 4-4-4 as the encima illustration. The value of the play is full of 10 points but the move is of mouth value becomes 15 points.

FUL. In order to form the FUL move. You need the five dice. Two data must be of a value. since the other three data other value. For example. The first two data. The values are. Six and six. The other three data would be four, four, four. As in encima illustration. The value of Ful move is ten points. But if the move is the value of mouth becomes fifteen points. More what is Ful mouth? Ful mouth is when the play is performed once.

To form the seguida move. There are two types of sequence data. The first sequence is from 1 to 5 and the other sequence is 2 to 6, for example 1-2-3-4-5 and 2-3-4-5-6 would be another sequence. As in encima illustration. The value to be marked seguida the play is 20 points, but if the move is to mouth the point becomes 25.

Seguida. To form the seguida move. there are two types of sequence data. The first sequence is from 1 to five. And the other sequence is from 2 to six. For example. One, Two, Three, Four, and Five. And the other would result. two, three, four, five and six. As in encima illustration. The value to be marked seguida the move is twenty points. But if the move is to mouth the point becomes vite-five. More which is seguida mouth? Seguida mouth is when the move is performed once.

To be able to play a quadrada must have four equal numbers. For example, 2-2-2-2 as in the illustration on top. These four equal data can be of any value, and the value that should be marked in the quadrada pass is 30 points. But if the quadrada is the mouth of the value becomes 35 points.

Quadrada. To be able to play a quadrada must have four equal numbers. For example. Two, two, two and two. As in encima illustration. these four equal data can be any value. and the value that should be marked on the quadrada move is thirty points. But if the quadrada is the mouth of the value becomes thirty-five points. More what it is quadrada of mouth? mouth is quadrada when play is performed once.

To form the General move you will need all five data are of the same value. For example, 5-5-5-5-5 data can be of any value, provided that they are equal. The value to be marked on the move General is forty points. But if the move is General of mouth. Ai the value becomes 100 points and the move is completed immediately because the player who made the general's mouth, wins the game with the sovereign point, regardless of whether another player is winning.

General. To form the play General. You will need all five data are of the same value. For example. Five, five, five, five, and five. Such data may be any value. Since they are equal. The value to be marked on the move General is forty points. But if the move is General of mouth. Ai the value becomes a hundred points. And the move is terminated immediately. Because the player who made the general's mouth. Wins the game with the sovereign point. Regardless if another player is winning. More what is general of mouth? General's mouth when the move is performed once. And will round ends.
You can save your game group if you want to play later.
